item.title: Automating Bug Bounties using Kubernetes and Argo
item.description: I have experimented a lot trying to create fast and efficient workflows that would help me automate my recon process during bug hunting. At first using Python, RabbitMQ and Docker but I have now moved my whole process inside GKE using Kubernetes and Argo Events. I found out that using Argo I can easily pass data from one pod to another inside the workflow and also use RabbitMQ as a message queue.
